entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: single_query #49910
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #49909
  • Perf improvement: json #49908
  • SSL connection fails sporadically #49906
  • BUG on API Android API 16 #49905
  • OAuth with Blazor (Server-Side) #49904
    Backlog
  • Yup, this is by design. Starting in 3.1, authorization attributes are handled by the [authorization middleware](https://github.com/BrightSoul/AuthorizationHandlerMultipleInvocations/blob/master/Startup.cs#L63) instead of being evaluated by MVC's authorization filter. However if you explicitly add an `AuthorizationFilter`, it would get separately executed. #49900
  • Configuring LogLevel via environment variables in "standard" docker images #49899

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49877
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49876
  • [SignalR-Cpp-Client] Streaming support #49863
  • Authentication and Authorization in Blazor Web App for .net 8 #49870
  • CORS setup not working properly with a fresh Blazor WebAssembly Hosted app #49871
  • In .Net7 Web API doesn't return multipart content #49841

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Update debugger display to use a consistent format #49898
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Don't pack Microsoft.Aspnetcore.Testing #49846
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Update NuGet #49872
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.22

Updated

  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove internal archives #49879
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2237802 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Disable CrossgenOutput for loongarch64 architecture #49862
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve debugger display in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http #49861
    area-runtime
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • [Blazor] Improve auto render mode selection strategy #49858
    area-blazor
  • Support view buffer-based rendering in Blazor #49860
    area-blazor
